get.description: Retrieves the details of the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Firm' object.

post.description: Creates a firm for the current authenticated client and registers an existing user as a staff member and firm owner.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the firm to be created.

400.description: When staff user does not exist or is already associated with another firm.

put.description: Updates firm details for the current authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the firm to be updated.

get.description: Retrieves a list of staff/user mappings in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns an array of one or more 'FirmUser' objects.

get.description: Retrieves a staff/user mapping (based on staff or user id parameter provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'FirmUser' object.

put.description: Updates a staff/user mapping in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be updated.

400.description: When staff or user has not been provided.

403.description: When staff does not belong to the firm.

delete.description:
Removes the user from the firm associated with the authenticated client.

The associated staff member is set as a former staff member and if they are a user, becomes a former user.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be deleted.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of staff members (filtered based on search parameters provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: email, name

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'Staff' objects

post.description: Creates a staff member in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be created.

get.description: Retrieves a staff member (based on staff id parameter provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Staff' object

400.description: When staff id parameter invalid or not provided

404.description: When staff member does not exist

put.description: Updates a staff member in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be updated.

404.description: When staff member does not exist

delete.description:
Sets the staff member from the firm associated with the authenticated client as a former staff member.

The staff member is set as a former staff member and if they are a user, becomes a former user. User access is also disabled.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be deleted.

404.description: When staff member does not exist

get.description:
If no `Location` is provided, all matter types from all locations will be returned (paginated)
Sample request:
            
    GET /mattertypes

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Searches for partial match on matter type name

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific location. In the US API this is the ANSI 2 letter state code (e.g. IL, NY). In the AU API this is shorthand state code (e.g. NSW, ACT, etc)

parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific category.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Return matter types by category type (i.e. MatterType or LeadType).

id.description: Unique identifier of the bank account.

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the activity.

updatedByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that last updated the activity.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.
If set, rate type must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

isDeleted.description: True if the activity is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the activity.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.

If set, rateType must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Id of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

userId.description: Id of the file owner. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

dateCreated.description: The original datetime that the file was created. If null the current datetime will be used

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Id of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

userId.description: Id of the user modifying the file. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

fileAdditionalData.description: Collection of KeyValuePair(string, string) to update File meta data.

userId.description: Id of the user modifying the folder. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

fileName.description:
The name of the attachment file. Mandatory field.
Accepted file types are: jpeg, jpg, pdf, png.

AddAttachmentDto.description: This object holds data for a request to upload an expense attachment.

expenseId.description: The id of the expense that a file will be uploaded to.

uploadUrl.description: The URL for uploading the file.

AddAttachmentInfo.description: Return value for a request to add an expense attachemnt.

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the expense.

createdByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that created the expense.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the associated matter.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

amount.description:
Total amount of the expense. Calculated as Price * Quantity.

This amount ignores GST (if applicable). See Billing.Expenses.Api.Shared.Resources.Expense.AmountExcTax and Billing.Expenses.Api.Shared.Resources.Expense.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

isDeleted.description: True if the expense is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the expense.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the fee.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the associated matter.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

createdByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that created the fee.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that updated the fee.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

duration.description: The duration of the fee in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

amount.description:
Total amount of the fee in dollars. Calculated using Rate and Duration depending on the fee type.

This amount includes tax depending on the TaxInclusive property. See Billing.Fees.Api.Shared.Resources.Fee.AmountExcTax and Billing.Fees.Api.Shared.Resources.Fee.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

billableAmountExcTax.description:
Billable amount excluding tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as AmountExcTax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable and some not),
this value will contain the amount calculated from billable items only.

billableTax.description:
Billable tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as Tax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable
and some not), this value will contain the tax calculated from billable items only.
In all other cases, the value will be the same as Tax.

isDeleted.description: True if the fee is deleted.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the fee.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

duration.description: The duration of the fee in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the fee is invoiced externally.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

isBillable.description: True if the fee source item is billable.
True if the fee source item is billable.

acn.description: Australian Company Number of the firm (only applicable for AUS).

isInternal.description: Whether firm is being created for internal use. Internal firms will not be subscribed for payment processing and will not be charged.

former.description: Whether he/she is a former member.

former.description: Whether he/she is a former member.

matterId.description: The id of the matter that the invoice belongs to.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: The id of the user that last updated the invoice.

issuedDate.description: The date the invoice has been issued.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due.

paidDate.description: The date the invoice was paid.

waived.description: True if the invoice is waived.

expenseTotal.description: All expenses (written off + non written off)

deprecatedId.description: Id without ItemId, used for backward compatibility

state.description: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the key/value pair.

externalSystemId.description: Id of this matter in an external system

openedDate.description: Returns the date the matter was opened.

closedDate.description: Returns the date the matter was closed.

matterTypeId.description: Should be a standard matter type when creating a 'Matter' and a lead matter type when creating a 'Lead'

providerId.description: Specifies the provider name for this item.

createdDateUtc.description: Will default to the current datetime

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the matter stage was last updated.

MatterStage.description: Contains the current stage of the matter.

isDeleted.description: True when the stage is deleted.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the stage was last updated.

Stage.description: Contains information of a stage in a stage set.

id.description: Unique identifier of the stage set.

isDeleted.description: True when the stage set is deleted.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the stage set was last updated.

StageSet.description: Contains the stage set and stages information.

staffId.description: Staff member creating or updating the task.

completedByStaffId.description: Staff member completing the task. Must only be set when {IsCompleted} is true.

isCompleted.description: True when the task is completed.

assigneeIds.description: Staff members assigned to the task.
